statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_feedback
SELECT comments FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 100
SELECT satisfaction_score, date_of_survey FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY date_of_survey DESC
SELECT patient_id, MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score FROM patient_feedback GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT MIN(satisfaction_score) AS min_score, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM patient_feedback
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM patient_feedback
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE comments IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Feedback
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM Feedback
SELECT comments FROM Feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age < 30
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY admission_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM Feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age < 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, satisfaction_score, comments FROM Feedback WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND satisfaction_score <= 2;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM PatientFeedback;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT measure_name, measure_value FROM QualityMeasures WHERE measure_value < 5;
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE patient_id = 102;
SELECT measure_name, measure_value FROM QualityMeasures WHERE measure_value < 0.5 ORDER BY measure_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT feedback_text, survey_question, survey_answer FROM PatientFeedback JOIN SurveyResponses ON PatientFeedback.feedback_id = SurveyResponses.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyQuestion WHERE question_type='Multiple Choice';
SELECT response_text FROM SurveyResponse WHERE question_id=1;
SELECT outcome_type, outcome_value FROM HealthcareOutcome WHERE patient_id=101 ORDER BY outcome_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback ORDER BY date_received DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT response_text, outcome_type FROM SurveyResponse INNER JOIN HealthcareOutcome ON SurveyResponse.feedback_id = HealthcareOutcome.patient_id WHERE outcome_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM HealthcareOutcome WHERE outcome_type LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY outcome_value DESC;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.date_received, h.outcome_type FROM PatientFeedback p LEFT JOIN HealthcareOutcome h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE h.outcome_value > 200;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT survey_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY date_conducted DESC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments WHERE location LIKE '%office%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT patients.first_name, ratings.question FROM patients JOIN ratings ON patients.patient_id = ratings.rating_scale;
SELECT surveys.*, departments.* FROM surveys INNER JOIN departments ON surveys.department = departments.department_name;
SELECT feedback.comments, patients.first_name FROM feedback JOIN patients ON feedback.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE feedback.rating < 3;
SELECT CONCAT(patients.first_name, ' ', patients.last_name) AS full_name, surveys.date_conducted FROM patients CROSS JOIN surveys;
